mapper.select: select invoice_type as status , count(1) as totalCount from ope_invoice_order group by status

select count(1) from ope_invoice_order invorder left join ope_sys_staff staff on invorder.consignee_user = staff.id and staff.dr = 0 left join ope_sys_staff crstaff on invorder.created_by = crstaff.id and crstaff.dr = 0

select invorder.id as id, invorder.invoice_no as invoiceNo, invorder.invoice_type as invoiceType, invorder.invoice_status as invoiceStatus, invorder.invoice_qty as invoiceType, invorder.purchase_id as purchaseId, invorder.purchase_no as purchaseNo, invorder.delivery_date as deliveryDate, invorder.consignee_user as receiverId, staff.first_name as receiverFirstName, staff.last_name as receiverLastName, invorder.consignee_country_code as receiverCountryCode, invorder.consignee_user_telephone as receiverTelephone, invorder.consignee_user_mail as receiverMail, invorder.created_by as createById, crstaff.first_name as createByFirstName, invorder.invoice_qty as invoiceQty, crstaff.last_name as createByLastName, invorder.created_time as createByDate from ope_invoice_order invorder left join ope_sys_staff staff on invorder.consignee_user = staff.id and staff.dr = 0 left join ope_sys_staff crstaff on invorder.created_by = crstaff.id and crstaff.dr = 0
limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}

select inorder.id as id, inorder.invoice_no as invoiceNo, inorder.invoice_status as invoiceStatus, inorder.invoice_type as invoicetype, inorder.trans_type as transportType, inorder.consignee_user as consigneeUserId, consignee.first_name as consigneeUserFistName, consignee.last_name as consigneeUserLastName, inorder.consignee_country_code as consigneeUserCountryCode, inorder.consignee_user_telephone as consigneeUserTelephone, inorder.consignee_user_mail as consigneeUserEmail, inorder.consignee_post_code as zipCodeName, inorder.consignee_address as address, inorder.delivery_date as deliveryDate, inorder.consignor_user as consignorUserId, consignor.first_name as consignorUserFistName, consignor.last_name as consignorUserLastName, inorder.consignor_country_code as consignorUserCountryCode, inorder.consignor_telephone as consignorUserTelephone, inorder.consignor_mail as consignorUserEmail, inorder.notify_user as notifyUser, inorder.notify_user_name as notifyUserName, inorder.notify_country_code as notifyUserCountryCode, inorder.notify_user_telephone as notifyUserTelephone, inorder.notify_user_mail as notifyUserEmail from ope_invoice_order inorder left join ope_sys_staff consignee on consignee.id = inorder.consignee_user and consignee.dr = 0 left join ope_sys_staff consignor on consignor.id = inorder.consignor_user and consignor.dr = 0 where inorder.dr = 0 and inorder.id=#{id}

select scooterB.id as id, scooterB.group_id as categoryId, spgroup.group_name as categoryName, scooterB.color_id as colorId, color.color_name as colorName, scooterB.qty as totalQty from ope_invoice_scooter_b scooterB left join ope_specificat_group spgroup on spgroup.id = scooterB.group_id and spgroup.dr = 0 left join ope_color color on color.id = scooterB.color_id and color.dr = 0 where scooterB.dr=0 and scooterB.invoice_id=#{id}

select combinB.id as id, combin.en_name as name, combin.bom_no as serialN, combinB.qty as totalQty from ope_invoice_combin_b combinB inner join ope_production_combin_bom combin on combin.id = combinB.production_combin_bom_id where combinB.dr = 0 and combinB.invoice_id = #{id};

select partB.id as id, partB.parts_name as name, part.parts_type as partType, part.parts_no as serialN, partB.qty as totalQty from ope_invoice_parts_b partB inner join ope_production_parts part on part.id = partB.parts_id and part.dr = 0 where partB.dr = 0 and partB.invoice_id = #{id};

select detail.id as id, detail.unique_code as sn, detail.color_id, detail.group_id, detail.qty, 1 as productType from ope_invoice_scooter_detail_b detail where detail.dr = 0 and detail.invoice_id = #{id}

select detail.id as id, detail.unique_code as sn, detail.qty, detail.production_combin_bom_id as partId, 2 as productType from ope_invoice_combin_detail_b detail where detail.dr = 0 and detail.invoice_id=#{id}
select detail.id as id, detail.unique_code as sn, detail.qty, detail.parts_id as partId, 3 as productType from ope_invoice_parts_detail_b detail where detail.dr = 0 and detail.invoice_id=#{id}
select id, invoice_no as orderNo, created_time from ope_invoice_order where dr = 0 and purchase_id = #{purchaseId}
